fetchTeacherCourses.description: Get all courses taught by the logged-in teacher

fetchStudentsForCourse.description: Get all students enrolled in a given course
fetchStudentsForCourse.query: collection('users') WHERE role == 'student' AND enrolledCourses array-contains courseId

fetchStudentCourses.description: Get all courses a student is enrolled in

fetchActiveCoursesByUniversity.description: Active courses for a specific university/semester/year
fetchActiveCoursesByUniversity.query: collection('courses') WHERE university == selectedUniversity AND semester == selectedSemester AND year == selectedYear AND status == 'active'

fetchStudentsByUniversity.description: All students in a given university
fetchStudentsByUniversity.query: collection('users') WHERE role == 'student' AND universities array-contains selectedUniversity
